name: Mamegoma: Happy! Sweets Farm
description: 'Mamegoma: Happy! Sweets Farm' (otherwise known as まめゴマはっぴー！スイーツファーム) is a virtual pet simulation title for the Nintendo 3DS. Released in Japan on March 5th, 2015, it is based on a seal toy brand of the same name ('Mamegoma'), which is managed by San-X. It is the second of two total titles made for the Nintendo 3DS.
